events.name: Poisonous mist
events.description: Green mists floats around the room. Whoever touches it gets sick.

events.name: Glowing rock
events.description: Huge rock stands in the middle of the room. It glows when you get near it.

events.name: Plate of cookies
events.description: On the blanket lays plate of cookies. Whoever eats one, immediately gets fat.

events.name: Drink me
events.description: You see little flask asking to drink it. If one do, one becomes really fast, but really dumb.

events.name: Pile of dust
events.description: In the room corner lays a huge pile of dust. Touching it get's you strong, but sleepy.

events.name: Antiwish stone
events.description: If while holding stone wish gets pronounced, opposite of it happens.

events.name: Wand of no secrets
events.description: If one holds the wand, one answers all questions truthfully.

events.name: Trapdoor
events.description: If standed on, trapdoor opens and throws party into deep pit with no easy way out.
